channel.title: Posts on A Girl Has No R Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on A Girl Has No R Blog

item.title: Finally! A Blog!
item.description: Well this took me way too long to get up and running! But here we are :) Hello, and welcome! Why another R blog? I’m starting this blog for a few reasons. First, I want to use it as a way to document my own R journey. I figured I’d document it for lots of reasons: a way to showcase my own work, career development, networking, everyone in the R community says you should do it, blah blah blah.
